subject: re:Special offer
body:
Dear valued member.
We offer you a unique opportunity to save on one of the most essential goods ever - our prices for generic Canadian drugs will definitely be able to please you.
MyCanadianPharmacy offers you a perfect match of quality and price - Canadian drugs. Being as effective as the products of major USA pharmaceutical companies, Canadian drugs are much cheaper. That's a deal you wouldn't waste, would you?
Visit our online storeto find out about our great prices.http://knewpush.hk

Best regards,Michael Huff
